comments:
I already opened a similar defect, but I did not get confirmaiton back. So I 
reopen this one and put more details. 

How to reproduce the problem: 
With Coron+AST build or Rational Developer build
Create a cmp then add (DataClass or CopyHelper type)AccessBean to cmp.
Then it will triger the null pointer exception. 
My guess is Beanifno component is not intinitialized properly. Here is detail 
trace.

yet.
